channel.title: ~*~Sclyfe~*~ from devolution v7
channel.description:
Sclyfe
Hello, for some time now I have been planning to make a website about programming and gaming. Then I had the idea to get back into rs private servers. I created a website a while back for my programming site and I will be buying a full domain and make it about the rs private server we will be creating. I will be in need of help with coding the server/client. In this coming week I will be buying the domain, and forums should be open. But the server may take some time... if u want to help out contact me by posting here, pming me, and reaching my msn: ashy1000000@hotmail.com.
Im using devolution 7.0 as base because of its stabablity. [hr] [b][size=5]Skills:[/size][/b] [b]Attack, Defence, and Strength 90% added better animations, and some timers. woodcutting 90% havent done much just kept the same. theiving 90% not including stalls which i might or might not add... agility 90% every obstacle on agility course works, im working on the animations and glitches. minning 85% fixed speed runecrafting 85% added full runecrafting my way magic 75% no runes needed atm, most ancient and normal spells have right gfx and most work. heblore 55% added potion making and grinding working on identification on herbs. range 50% added pullback working on projectiles. fishing 50% need to add more than just shrimps and need to fix animations. fletching 45% needs alot of work. many glitches cooking 30% needs alot of work. firemaking 20% needs alot of work. crafting 15% i added gem cutting and bowstring making... smithing 15% many glitches.. needs alot of work... prayer 5% meh......... slayer 0% startig on it soon... working on it adding tasks... farming 0% may or may not add... might add it... [/b] [br] [b][size=5]Minigames:[/size][/b]
Barrows 0%
[br]
[b][size=5]Quests:[/size][/b]
nameless custom 0%
[br] Things Finished so Far: [b]1. fixed running/walking glitch 2. Npcs now face you when attacking them 3. made client.java smaller 4. 90% magic ancient and regular 5. made a magic.cfg 6. made a doors.cfg 7. changed starting location 8. erased almost all the NPCs 9. added more NPCs 10. fixed 1 banking glitch 11. added/fixed alot of skills 12. fixed many glitches 13. more npcs and drops added 14. fixed a shop glitch [/b]
[hr] [size=5]Pictures Coming Soon[/size][hr]
**This thread will be updated so be sure to check back!**
please post your comments and suggestions.

item.title: ~*~Sclyfe~*~ from devolution v7
item.dc:creator: @yhsa2nd yhsa2nd
item.description:
@yhsa2nd wrote:

Sclyfe

Hello, for some time now I have been planning to make a website about programming and gaming. Then I had the idea to get back into rs private servers. I created a website a while back for my programming site and I will be buying a full domain and make it about the rs private server we will be creating. I will be in need of help with coding the server/client. In this coming week I will be buying the domain, and forums should be open. But the server may take some time… if u want to help out contact me by posting here, pming me, and reaching my msn: ashy1000000@hotmail.com.

Im using devolution 7.0 as base because of its stabablity.
[hr]
[size=5]Skills:[/size]
Attack, Defence, and Strength 90% added better animations, and some timers.
woodcutting 90% havent done much just kept the same.
theiving 90% not including stalls which i might or might not add…
agility 90% every obstacle on agility course works, im working on the animations and glitches.
minning 85% fixed speed
runecrafting 85% added full runecrafting my way
magic 75% no runes needed atm, most ancient and normal spells have right gfx and most work.
heblore 55% added potion making and grinding working on identification on herbs.
range 50% added pullback working on projectiles.
fishing 50% need to add more than just shrimps and need to fix animations.
fletching 45% needs alot of work. many glitches
cooking 30% needs alot of work.
firemaking 20% needs alot of work.
crafting 15% i added gem cutting and bowstring making…
smithing 15% many glitches… needs alot of work…
prayer 5% meh…
slayer 0% startig on it soon… working on it adding tasks…
farming 0% may or may not add… might add it…

[br]
[size=5]Minigames:[/size]

Barrows 0%

[br]

[size=5]Quests:[/size]

nameless custom 0%

[br]
Things Finished so Far:
1. fixed running/walking glitch
2. Npcs now face you when attacking them
3. made client.java smaller
4. 90% magic ancient and regular
5. made a magic.cfg
6. made a doors.cfg
7. changed starting location
8. erased almost all the NPCs
9. added more NPCs
10. fixed 1 banking glitch
11. added/fixed alot of skills
12. fixed many glitches
13. more npcs and drops added
14. fixed a shop glitch

[hr]
[size=5]Pictures Coming Soon[/size][hr]

This thread will be updated so be sure to check back!

please post your comments and suggestions.
